DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
At the end of your turn take half of the damage stored by the Kinetic Buffer.
Takes an additional 5% damage per stack. Does not expire.
When played add a copy of this to your hand with #yEthereal and #yExhaust.
Threshold cards will change effects when the #yKinetic #yBuffer holds more than half your current life.
While Fortified all incoming attack damage is #yBuffered. Ends when any attack is played.
